example: She came on stage sounding like our deepest contralto , Cloe Elmo.
example_meaning: Nghe cô ấy hát trên sân khấu như là giọng nữ trầm sâu nhất Cloe Elmo.
definition: (music) the lowest female voice or voice part, higher than tenor and lower than soprano. The terms contralto and alto refer to a similar musical pitch, but among singers, the term contralto is reserved for female singers; the equivalent male form is counter-tenor. Originally the contratenor altus was a high countermelody sung against the tenor or main melody.

definition: Differing from the norm, from the expected type; abnormal, anomalous.
